channel.title: The Hon. Bob McDonnell
channel.description: The Hon. Bob McDonnell Chairman, Committee on Resolutions and Governor ­ Virginia (Remarks as Prepared for Delivery)

item.title: Fellow delegates, Mr. Chairman:
item.author: The Hon. Bob McDonnell

item.title: It's been an honor to chair the deliberations of your Committee on Resolutions of the Republican platform committee.
item.author: The Hon. Bob McDonnell

item.title: I appreciate the diligent work of the 112 men and women from 50 states and six territories who served on that committee.
item.author: The Hon. Bob McDonnell

item.title: They discussed, debated and delivered. It was a good team.
item.author: The Hon. Bob McDonnell

item.title: I want to thank my co-chairs, Sen. John Hoeven of North Dakota and Congresswoman Marsha Blackburn of Tennessee.
item.author: The Hon. Bob McDonnell

item.title: And I thank the staff of the RNC who conducted countless meetings and conference calls to compose this document.
item.author: The Hon. Bob McDonnell

item.title: We have outlined a conservative vision of governance, a document that is many things--an indictment, a blueprint and a declaration of values.
item.author: The Hon. Bob McDonnell

item.title: It is an invitation and a pledge.
item.author: The Hon. Bob McDonnell

item.title: First, it is an indictment of the failed policies of the current administration's record of debt, job losses and government overreach.
item.author: The Hon. Bob McDonnell

item.title: More importantly, our platform is a blueprint for rebuilding the cherished American dream.
item.author: The Hon. Bob McDonnell

item.title: It is an overview of our conservative principles and detailed policies for how we jumpstart economic growth and job creation. This ambitious blueprint projects a sea change in the way government works.
item.author: The Hon. Bob McDonnell

item.title: It offers solutions for workers without jobs, families without savings and neighborhoods without hope.
item.author: The Hon. Bob McDonnell

item.title: This platform addresses the elderly who are worried about Medicare.
item.author: The Hon. Bob McDonnell

item.title: It tells the truth about Obamacare and the need to repeal and replace it.
item.author: The Hon. Bob McDonnell

item.title: This blueprint lays out a bold agenda for government reform -- a government that operates to serve the people better at less cost.
item.author: The Hon. Bob McDonnell

item.title: States are going to take center stage in the long-overdue renewal of American society.
item.author: The Hon. Bob McDonnell

item.title: By reclaiming management of education.
item.author: The Hon. Bob McDonnell

item.title: By reforming Medicaid and welfare programs.
item.author: The Hon. Bob McDonnell

item.title: By managing environmental problems locally.
item.author: The Hon. Bob McDonnell

item.title: By enacting a comprehensive energy policy.
item.author: The Hon. Bob McDonnell

item.title: This platform affirms the traditional meaning of marriage and the sanctity of human life, defends religious freedom and Second Amendment rights and calls for a balanced budget amendment.
item.author: The Hon. Bob McDonnell

item.title: This platform is an invitation. It invites every American to consider what kind of country we want to be.
item.author: The Hon. Bob McDonnell

item.title: An America where every person matters, every worker has an opportunity to work and every family can aspire to a better future.
item.author: The Hon. Bob McDonnell

item.title: We invite Americans to consider this platform: a call for dramatic change in government, from stagnation to prosperity, from an entitlement society to an opportunity society.
item.author: The Hon. Bob McDonnell

item.title: This platform is a pledge.
item.author: The Hon. Bob McDonnell

item.title: We will restore American leadership in the world and honor our courageous men and women in uniform.
item.author: The Hon. Bob McDonnell

item.title: We will stand by our friends and stand against those who dare to harm us.
item.author: The Hon. Bob McDonnell

item.title: That is your platform. I urge its adoption. It is now my great pleasure to introduce one of my co-chairs of the platform committee, the outstanding senator and former governor from the state of North Dakota, John Hoeven. Please give him a warm welcome!
item.author: The Hon. Bob McDonnell
